action_item: Users & Roles - Personalize the application settings for better user experience.
notes: Focus on User Appearance tab to customize landing page and inbox.

action_item: Users & Roles - Change main login password for enhanced security.
notes: Follow the steps in the settings tab to change the password.

action_item: Users & Roles - Update eSignature ID for secure document signing.
notes: Complete the two-step process to validate and change the eSignature ID.

action_item: Users & Roles - Update visual signature for documents.
notes: Validate eSignature ID before drawing a new signature.

action_item: Reports - Customize clinical document templates using CCDA format.
notes: Select and order patient chart sections for clinical summaries.
